StoryText: I'm done with work but my boss %FullName:NPC:2% asks if I can stay and help %Pron:2:2% with some other things that need to be done.
Question: I'm supposed to go to %FullName:NPC:1%'s house and hang out with friends. What should I do?

OptionText.Text: Help %FullName:NPC:2% take all the trash out.

OptionResult.Result: My boss is fine with this and I go have a fun time with %FullName:NPC:1% and our friends.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I know I could've gotten some extra money if I stayed but I just didn't feel like it. I was done with work and just wanted to go hang out with %FullName:NPC:1% and our other friends. And it was a fun time and a good way to unwind after work.

OptionResult.Result: The trash bags rip open and spill all over me, but I also find $75 in the trash!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:2% is happy I helped %Pron:2:2% out and paid me $50 extra. In addition to that, I found $75 in the trash. But it came at the cost of spilling stinky trash all over myself so when I get to %FullName:NPC:1%'s house all our other friends are disgusted by me and how badly I smell.

OptionResult.Result: I make $50 for cleaning the bathrooms but it makes me late to %FullName:NPC:1%'s house.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Well, I got the extra $50 and %FullName:NPC:2% is happy with me for helping out but now I wish I didn't do it because it took me so long that I wind us being really late to get to %FullName:NPC:1%'s place and %Pron:1:1% is annoyed with me now.
